body:
```console
$ spack env create -d derp
$ spack -e derp add llvm
$ spack -e derp -c upstreams:derp:install_tree:/my/upstream concretize --force --reuse
[^]  pqezotj  llvm@12.0.1%gcc@7.5.0~clang~...
...
$ spack -e derp config add upstreams:derp:install_tree:/my/upstream
$ spack -e derp concretize --force --reuse
 -   m2jpox5  llvm@13.0.0%gcc@7.5.0+clang~...
...
```
title: upstreams config not picked up in env
